summary: Forgotten Fable is my own project where I recreate the Fable series weapons and outfits into Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://tagnumelite.com/images/ForgottenFableNexusFeature.png[/img]
Forgotten Fable is a project of mine where I take all the weapons and armour from the Fable series and recreate them in Skyrim!

[color=#00ffff]Features[/color]: [color=#cc0000]Planned[/color] - [color=#ff7700]WIP[/color] - [color=#00ff00]Done[/color]
[list]
[*][color=#ff7700]CBBE[/color]
[/list]
[b][color=#00ff00]Installation[/color][/b]:
[u][color=#6aa84f]Automatic[/color][/u]: Use NMM or MO
[color=#93c47d]Manual[/color]: 
[list=1]
[*]Things
[/list]
[b][color=#ff0000]Uninstallation[/color][/b]:
[u][color=#e06666]Automatic[/color][/u]: Use NMM or MO
Manual:
[list=1]
[*]Remove FFable folder from the each subfolder
[*]Delete [code]FFable.(esm|esp)[/code]
[*]Delete all [code]FFable - *.bsa[/code]
[/list]
author: TagnumElite
